mapper.select: SELECT P.PST_IDX, P.PST_CATE, P.PST_TITLE, P.PST_CMT_CNT, COALESCE(U.USER_NICKNAME, B.BUSS_NICKNAME) AS AUTHOR_NICKNAME, P.PST_REGDATE, P.PST_HIT, P.PST_LIKE FROM PUB_PST P LEFT JOIN PUB_USER U ON P.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX LEFT JOIN PUB_BUSS B ON P.BUSS_IDX = B.BUSS_IDX WHERE P.PST_DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY CASE WHEN P.PST_CATE = '필독' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, P.PST_IDX DESC;

SELECT P.PST_IDX, P.PST_CATE, P.PST_TITLE, P.PST_CMT_CNT, COALESCE(U.USER_NICKNAME, B.BUSS_NICKNAME) AS AUTHOR_NICKNAME, P.PST_REGDATE, P.PST_HIT, P.PST_LIKE, P.PST_CONT, P.PST_IMG FROM PUB_PST P LEFT JOIN PUB_USER U ON P.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX LEFT JOIN PUB_BUSS B ON P.BUSS_IDX = B.BUSS_IDX WHERE P.PST_IDX = #{pstIdx}
